text: Sahodharan Sahadevan is a 2003 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Sunil, starring Mukesh and Geethu Mohandas in the lead roles. The film is based on the 1979 Hindi movie Bin Phere Hum Tere, starring Asha Parekh. ==Cast== * Mukesh as Aravindan/Mukundan * Geethu Mohandas as Aarathi * Kalabhavan Ansar * Maniyanpilla Raju * Augustine as Kunjananthan * Jagadish as Appukkuttan * K. T. S. Padannayil * Kaviyoor Renuka as Aravindan/Mukundan's mother * Kozhikode Sharada * Machan Varghese * N. F. Varghese as Doctor * Kozhikode Narayanan Nair * Poojappura Ravi * Reena * Roslin * Sreeja Chandran as Yamuna * T. S. Raju ==References== ==External links== * Category:2003 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Sahodharan Sahadevan
